Tutorial1: ^You have been awoken to test the average human neural processing capabilities

s: ^Use WASD to move, and the mouse to look around

c-0: ^Once you have stretched your legs sufficiently, proceed to the next room.

Tutorial2: ^Just through the next door we can begin our tests.
^Press the SPACE BAR to jump up the ledge.
Cubes1: ^Oh no, it seems the power cubes have been removed from their recepticles.
^Please put the cubes back, the doors can't function without their electrcity.
Cubes2: ^The cubes are, in layman's terms, nuclear. If any remain in contact for long... shall we say, we may have another few moons.
^Their casings should cause them to violently push away any cube they come into contact with, but its best not to risk anything
